summary: Testing iteration 189 - Comprehensive testing of LocalMarket/Avida marketplace after dependency updates. FIXED: Critical bug - ActivityIndicator not imported in search.tsx causing search page crash. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend core features verified.

minor.issue: Returns 520 error (observed in console but not blocking)
Background error in engagement notification loop: 'user_id' key error (not user-facing)

bug_fixes.issue: ReferenceError: ActivityIndicator is not defined - causing search page to crash with error boundary
bug_fixes.fix: Added ActivityIndicator to the import statement from 'react-native'

critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: search.tsx was using ActivityIndicator component but it was not imported
localStorage quota exceeded warning for @cache_home_listings - may want to implement cache cleanup for large datasets
Console warning: No route named 'search' in nested children - routing config may need review
520 error observed for /api/pwa/sw.js - service worker endpoint returning error

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all core pages load without loading indicators)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 189 verified comprehensive testing after dependency updates. Fixed critical bug - ActivityIndicator import missing in search.tsx. All core marketplace features working: homepage with listings/categories, search with proper URL routing, category pages, listing details, login page with OAuth, profile page, admin UI. Backend APIs all passing (health, listings, categories, search, feature-settings, admin-ui). Cache-first pattern working correctly throughout the app. Minor non-blocking issues: localStorage quota warning for home listings cache, 520 error on service worker endpoint.
